detectors.description: Variable PlusVaray._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVaray.sol#43) is not in mixedCase

PlusVaray.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVaray.sol#53-61) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 8000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVaray.sol#57)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:

	- PlusVaray.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVaray.sol#75-79)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
